title: Encountering the Personal God pt 3: How Parabolic Knowledge Collapses Explosive Comparisons
description:
I posit a 5th way of knowing: parabolic knowledge of the patterned reality in which we are embedded with those precious relationships which are always relevant to us.
John Vervaeke with Andrew Sweeney https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=C42TmeFHNmI
Paul VanderKlay with Catholic theologian: The Search for the Substance of God, Brett Salkeld on Transubstantiation https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SloRs2yzmvo 
Me on Paul VanderKlay's channel:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EN-PQ3uUm4Y
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mSiXzJkIj0c
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WdlMtQSKszc
